眾.definition: (bound form) crowd; multitude; (bound form) many; numerous

眾人拾柴火焰高.pinyin: zhòng rén shí chái huǒ yàn gāo
眾人拾柴火焰高.definition: lit. when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (proverb); fig. the more people, the more strength

眾人敬仰.definition: universally admired; highly esteemed by everyone

眾包.definition: crowdsourcing; abbr. for 群眾外包|群众外包[qun2 zhong4 wai4 bao1]

眾叛親離.definition: lit. people rebelling and friends deserting (idiom); fig. to find oneself utterly isolated

眾口同聲.definition: (of people) to be of one voice (idiom); unanimous

眾口鑠金.definition: lit. public opinion is powerful enough to melt metal (idiom); fig. public clamor can obscure the actual truth; mass spreading of rumors can confuse right and wrong

眾寡懸殊.definition: (idiom) a great disparity in numerical strength

眾志成城.definition: unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)

眾怒難犯.definition: (idiom) one cannot afford to incur public wrath; it is dangerous to incur the anger of the masses

眾所週知.definition: variant of 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4suo3zhou1zhi1]

眾星拱月.definition: see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]

眾星拱辰.definition: lit. all the stars revolve around Polaris 北辰[Bei3 chen2] (idiom, from Analects); fig. to view sb as core figure; to group around a revered leader

眾星捧月.definition: lit. all the stars cup themselves around the moon (idiom, from Analects); fig. to view sb as core figure; to group around a revered leader; to revolve around sb

眾星攢月.definition: see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]

眾望所歸.definition: (idiom) to enjoy popular support; to receive general approval

眾目昭彰.definition: lit. the masses are sharp-eyed (idiom); fig. one is subjected to the scrutiny of the general public

眾目睽睽.definition: (idiom) (under) the public eye; the stares of many people

眾盲摸象.definition: multitude of blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra 大般涅槃經|大般涅盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture; to mistake the part for the whole; unable to see the wood for the trees

眾矢之的.definition: lit. target of a multitude of arrows (idiom); the butt of public criticism; attacked on all sides

眾說紛揉.definition: lit. diverse opinions confused and divided (idiom); opinions differ; controversial matters

眾議員.definition: member of the House of Representatives

眾議院.definition: lower house of bicameral assembly; House of Representatives (USA); Chamber of Deputies
